# Notes

The exchange rate canister, which uses this feature is on the system subnet:

uzr34-akd3s-xrdag-3ql62-ocgoh-ld2ao-tamcv-54e7j-krwgb-2gm4z-oqe

panels.description: This metric is not persisted across upgrades. So a decrease usually means that a subnet upgraded
